If you are charged, your amount will be refunded within 4–5 working days. You can also write to us at support@rapidbox.in. The inconvenience caused is deeply regretted. You have 130 usable Rapidcoins. Earn 40 more to claim your first free product. Earn\nMore Share this product with your friends Your order is placed. We will deliver it to\n your doorsteps shortly.
